Source.Name: powerline
Source.Summary: Powerline vim plugin and shell prompts
Source.Description: Powerline is a statusline plugin for vim, and provides statuslines and prompts for several other applications, including zsh, bash, tmux, IPython, Awesome and Qtile.

Package.Name: powerline
Package.Summary: Powerline vim plugin and shell prompts
Package.Description: Powerline is a statusline plugin for vim, and provides statuslines and prompts for several other applications, including zsh, bash, tmux, IPython, Awesome and Qtile.
